Package org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.experiment

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExperimentObserver
    The ExperimentObserver will be notified on all important events that occur during an experiment.
    ParameterObserver
    This interface defines a function for observing dynamic parameters from policies, learners etc.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CumulativeRewardAverager
    Averages the rewards at each time step over experiments
    DataAverager<T,S>
    A class for averaging experiment data over episodes.
    DataRecorder  
    DelayedDataAverager
    Delegates to an arbitrary averager starting delay steps after an episode has started.
    DoubleMatrix1DAverager
    Averages a vector valued variable at each time step over episodes.
    EpisodicCumulativeParameterAverager
    This class averages cumulative double data over episodes.
    EpisodicCumulativeRewardAverager
    This class averages the episodic cumulative reward over multiple experiments.
    EpisodicCumulativScalarAverager
    This class averages episodic cumulative (double) data over multiple experiments.
    EpisodicParameterAverager
    This class averages (over experiments) double data at the end of each episode.
    EpisodicPathLengthAverager
    Averages the number of steps the agent needed for each episode.
    EpisodicSaver
    The EpisodicSaver writes an object every n-episodes and every n-steps to a stream.
    EpisodicStepAverager
    This class counts the amount of taken actions per episode.
    EpisodicTerminalStateDataAverager
    This class averages cumulative double data over episodes.
    Experiment
    The experiment puts all the parts together.
    ExperimentData
    ExperimentData contains **all** data of an experiment to be stored via DataRecorder i.e. maxSteps , maxEpisodes, and all ExperimentStepData collected through the whole experiment.
    ExperimentStepData
    Data containing information for a given step i.e. state, action, ... reward, isTerminal state as well as the episode and step for which this data was collected.
    NumberOfActiveNetworkNodesAverager
    Averages the number of active network nodes.
    NumberOfDifferenceNetworkNodesAverager
    Averages the number of network nodes added/deleted per step.
    OptimalActionAverager
    A class for averaging the optimal action selection at each time step (over episodes) w.r.t. the a given Q-function.
    ReplayExperiment
    The ReplayExperiment loads experimentData from an experiment and "re-runs" it.
    ReplayMultiExperiments
    The ReplayMultiExperiments loads multiple data from experiments and "re-runs" them.
    RewardAverager
    Averages the rewards at each time step over episodes
    ScalarAverager
    Averages the some scalar value at each time step over episodes.
    SimpleExperiment  
    StateTransitionAverager
    Averages state transitions that is state - nextState.
    StepLengthAverager
    Averages step length between a state transition i.e.
    StepLengthAveragerForEachDimension
    Averages the step length in each dimension (for each i ||(state.get(i) - nextState.get(i)|| ) keeping in mind that we may have to adjust some step lengths (see WrapAdjustedStepLengthAverager or MathUtils.shortestDistance for more info).
    StepwiseParameterAverager
    This class averages arbitrary double data, in a step-wise manner, observed from a ParameterObserver.
    WrapAdjustedStepLengthAverager
    Averages the step length between a state transition i.e.
